title: Richard Blumenthal
deleted: Blumenthal indicated a concern for the threat of [[UFOs]] in an April 2019 Space Force Senate hearing. He stated that "The American people have no idea about the imensity of the threat in space," as "the most important facts for the American people to understand today are the facts that haven't been said today, and the reason they haven't been said is that they are largely classified." He added, "If they were privy to what we hear, and you know it much better than we do because you live it, I think they'd be pretty alarmed." He affirmed, "We have an obligation to explain to the American people why space is a domain that matters, why the threats there are real and urgent, why they are growing and important."<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.c-span.org/video/?c4792306/user-clip-secretary-richard-blumenthals-fully-prepared-questions|title=User Clip: Secretary Richard Blumenthal's fully prepared questions | C-SPAN.org|website=www.c-span.org}}</ref>
